forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely before 8am, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 8am and 2pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. South wind 12 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 38 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
